prompt: Design a contact support page with a warm orange theme for a friendly vibe. Use a light orange background (Colors.orange[50]). Center content with 20px padding. Display a 'Support Center' title in dark orange (Colors.orange[900]) with a bold font. Add a subtitle 'Weâ€™re here for you' in grey (Colors.grey[600]). Include a form with Name (person icon), Email (email icon), and Message (multiline, message icon) fields, each with a white background (Colors.white) and orange borders (Colors.orange[600]). Arrange contact cards for Phone, Email, and Live Chat in a horizontal row, each with a light orange background (Colors.orange[100]) and rounded corners. Place a 'Submit Message' button at the bottom with a dark orange background (Colors.orange[900]) and white text. Use 16px spacing for a balanced layout.
